name: Ramoji Film City - Tara Comfort Hotel
description: The ideal getaway is surrounded by green spots and exquisitely carved pillars and statues. It offers best-in-class accommodation with stylish interiors, excellent food and services. The 126-room hotel has 24 hour fine-dining facilities, discotheque and business centre. It is excellent for a comfortable stay with all the modern amenities.
address: Ramoji Film City, Anaspur Village, Hyderabad 501512 India

roomTips.text: Great Experience and also good response, service good, front office also great response, wonderful experience Tara restaurant and also Staff
Evening checkin and morning checkout followed by tour will be better choice. It gives you energy to walk and explore film city
You can go to Pool @ Sitara in the morning 7:30

name: Sitara Luxury Hotel - Ramoji Film City
description: The hotel in the sprawling landscape evokes magnificence and grandeur. It offers well-appointed theme suites and royal suites. Endowed with starry delights and garden view — each floor of the 170 room hotel expresses a compelling theme and decor. Multi-cuisine restaurants, discotheque, sports club and in-house spa offer superstar-style extravaganza.
address: Ramoji Film City Main Rd, Hyderabad 501512 India
localName: Sitara Luxury Hotel - Ramoji Film City
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

roomTips.text: Be on time to make the fullest.

name: Treebo Trend Address Inn
description: If you are travelling to Hyderabad and are looking for comfortable accommodation in Banjara Hills, Treebo Address Inn is the perfect pick for you. Located in a quiet neighbourhood on the main road, it’s a modern-styled independent property suitable for corporates, medical tourists, couples, young singles, families, SME owners, and foreigners. If you’re travelling to Hyderabad by flight, the Rajiv Gandhi International Airport is located around 30 km from the hotel. If you are travelling by train, Secunderabad Railway Station is located about 9 km away and Kacheguda Railway Station is about 8 km from the hotel. Alternatively, the local Lakdikapul Train Station is 2 km away. You can also take a bus to the Mahatma Gandhi Bus Stand around 7 km away from the hotel. Treebo Address Inn features a total of 27 rooms spread over 5 floors, categorised into 7 Acacia, 5 Oak, and 15 Maple rooms.
address: Door No 13, 8 2 676 1 C A Road No 13 Banjara Hills, Opp Cafe Graffiti, Hyderabad 500034 India

name: Marigold Hotel
description:
If you’re looking for a trendy hotel in Hyderabad, look no further than Marigold By Greenpark.
While staying at Marigold By Greenpark, visitors can check out Hyderabadmyway.com (0.3 mi) and Begumpet Mosque (1.1 mi), some of Hyderabad's top attractions.
Rooms at Marigold By Greenpark offer a flat screen TV, a minibar, and air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
A rooftop terrace, a concierge, and room service are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A rooftop pool and free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Marigold By Greenpark, free parking is available.
If you like Chinese restaurants, Marigold By Greenpark is conveniently located near Sri Saravana Bhavan, Rika, and Once Upon a Time.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Buddha Statue (1.1 mi), Lumbini Park (1.1 mi), and Balkampet Yellamma Temple (1.1 mi), which are some popular Hyderabad attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.
The staff at Marigold By Greenpark looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.
address: 7-1-25, Ameerpet Rd Leelanagar, Begumpet, Hyderabad 500 016 India
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

roomTips.text: Book directly calling hotel front desk
